price: We chose them[8] knowingly over all other peoples.
arabic: وَلَقَدِ ٱخۡتَرۡنَٰهُمۡ عَلَىٰ عِلۡمٍ عَلَى ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
footnotes: [8] We chose the Children of Israel over all other peoples of their time for their numerous prophets.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
